trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Os eventos a seguir não são gerados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>classe a menos que haja pelo menos um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>DoubleClick, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Se houver pelo menos um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>na coleção, e o usuário interage com o cabeçalho de controle da guia (onde o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>nomes aparecerão), o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>gera o evento apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se a interação do usuário estiver na área do cliente da página da guia, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>gera o evento apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar é concluída.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>estão em coordenadas da tela, não em coordenadas do cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] code converts the properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte linha de [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] código converte as propriedades para um cliente <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE] > In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> and DragDrop events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised.
trans-unit.target: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE]> Em versões anteriores ao [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], se você colocar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>e DragDrop eventos em um Windows Form e arrastar e soltar algo para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>em tempo de design, o `DropDrop` e `DropEnter` os eventos são gerados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: However, when you close and reopen the solution, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> and DragDrop events are not raised again.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, quando você fechar e reabrir a solução, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>e eventos de DragDrop não são gerados novamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto é arrastado para os limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: The DragEnter event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento DragEnter é gerado quando o usuário arrasta primeiro o cursor do mouse sobre o controle durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> with DragEnter and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Em versões anteriores ao [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], se você colocar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>com DragEnter e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>eventos em um Windows Form e arrastar e soltar algo para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>em tempo de design, o `DropDrop` e `DropEnter` os eventos são gerados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: However, when you close and reopen the solution, the DragEnter and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> events are not raised again.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, quando você fechar e reabrir a solução, o DragEnter e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>os eventos não são gerados novamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>método determina o controle no local atual do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele verifica para ver se o controle é um destino válido.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor do mouse, o estado de teclado e o estado do botão do mouse são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai de uma janela, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the DragEnter for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra em outro controle, DragEnter para o controle é gerado.

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade de evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Continue`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>eventos são combinados para dar conforme o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem possa executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Cancel`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>estão em coordenadas da tela, não em coordenadas do cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] code converts the properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte linha de [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] código converte as propriedades para um cliente <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ```Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto é arrastado para fora dos limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: The DragLeave event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento DragLeave é gerado quando o usuário arrasta o cursor fora do controle ou o usuário cancela a operação de arrastar e soltar atual.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>método determina o controle no local atual do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele verifica para ver se o controle é um destino válido.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor do mouse, o estado de teclado e o estado do botão do mouse são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the DragLeave event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai de uma janela, o evento DragLeave é gerado.

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra em outro controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>para que o controle é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade de evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Continue`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>eventos são combinados para dar conforme o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem possa executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the DragLeave event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Cancel`, o evento DragLeave é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto é arrastado sobre os limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: The DragOver event is raised when the mouse cursor moves within the bounds of the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento DragOver é gerado quando o cursor do mouse se move dentro dos limites do controle durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>método determina o controle no local atual do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele verifica para ver se o controle é um destino válido.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor do mouse, o estado de teclado e o estado do botão do mouse são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai de uma janela, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra em outro controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>para que o controle é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the DragOver event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo controle, o evento DragOver é gerado.

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade de evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> value is `Continue`, the DragOver event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>valor é `Continue`, o evento DragOver é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DragOver and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O DragOver e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>eventos são combinados para dar conforme o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem possa executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Cancel`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>estão em coordenadas da tela, não em coordenadas do cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code converts the properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>: > > Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: A seguinte linha de C# código converte as propriedades para um cliente <xref:System.Drawing.Point>: >> ponto clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient (novo ponto (de. X, de. Y)); Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Supports rendering to the specified bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte à renderização para o bitmap especificado.

trans-unit.source: The DrawToBitmap method is not supported for ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para o método DrawToBitmap para controles ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A> event and provide custom printing logic if required.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>evento e fornecer lógica de impressão personalizada, se necessário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DrawToBitmap method has the following limitations: - An <xref:System.ArgumentException> might be thrown for large bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: O método DrawToBitmap tem as seguintes limitações: - um <xref:System.ArgumentException>pode ser gerado para bitmaps grandes.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable size varies by machine.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho máximo permitido varia de acordo com a máquina.

trans-unit.source: - DrawToBitmap does not support the `Ink` controls for the Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 operating system.
trans-unit.target: -DrawToBitmap não oferece suporte a `Ink` controles para o sistema operacional Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005.

trans-unit.source: - DrawToBitmap does not draw a child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -DrawToBitmap não consome um filho <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>é definido como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: - Controls inside containers are rendered in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: -Controles dentro de contêineres são processados na ordem inversa.

trans-unit.source: - DrawToBitmap is not fully functional for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>; only the border of a bitmap is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -DrawToBitmap não é totalmente funcional para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>; somente a borda de um bitmap é desenhada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The bitmap to be drawn to.
trans-unit.target: O bitmap a ser desenhada.

trans-unit.source: The bounds within which the control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Os limites dentro do qual o controle é processado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can respond to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle pode responder à interação do usuário.

trans-unit.source: With the Enabled property, you can enable or disable controls at run time.
trans-unit.target: Com a propriedade habilitado, você pode habilitar ou desabilitar os controles em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can disable controls that do not apply to the current state of the application.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode desabilitar os controles que não se aplicam ao estado atual do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: You can also disable a control to restrict its use.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode desabilitar o controle para impedir seu uso.

trans-unit.source: For example, a button can be disabled to prevent the user from clicking it.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um botão pode ser desabilitado para impedir que o usuário clicando nele.

trans-unit.source: If a control is disabled, it cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: Se um controle está desativado, não pode ser selecionado.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Setting the Enabled property to `false` does not disable the application's control box or prevent the application window from receiving the focus.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Definindo a propriedade Enabled `false` não desabilitar a caixa de controle do aplicativo ou impedir que a janela do aplicativo receber o foco.

trans-unit.source: When a container control has its enabled property set to `false`, all its contained controls are disabled, as well.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle de contêiner tem sua propriedade enabled definida como `false`, todos os seus controles contidos também são desabilitados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user clicks on any of the controls contained in a disabled <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control, no events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o usuário clica em qualquer um dos controles contidos em um desabilitado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>controle, nenhum evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a scrollable control is disabled, the scroll bars are also disabled.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando um controle rolável estiver desabilitado, as barras de rolagem também são desabilitadas.

trans-unit.source: For example, a disabled multiline textbox is unable to scroll to display all the lines of text.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma caixa de texto de várias linhas desabilitada é não é possível rolar para exibir todas as linhas de texto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can respond to user interaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle pode responder à interação do usuário; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>o valor da propriedade foi alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou a interação do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the return value of the asynchronous operation represented by the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> passed.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o valor de retorno da operação assíncrona representado pelo <xref:System.IAsyncResult>passado.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If the asynchronous operation has not been completed, this function will block until the result is available.
trans-unit.target: Se a operação assíncrona não tiver sido concluída, essa função será bloqueado até que o resultado estiver disponível.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, EndInvoke, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Além do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>propriedade, há quatro métodos em um controle que são thread-safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, EndInvoke, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>se o identificador para o controle já foi criado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>antes que o identificador do controle foi criado em um thread em segundo plano pode causar ilegal entre chamadas de thread.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: Para todas as outras chamadas de método, você deve usar um dos métodos invoke realizar marshaling da chamada para thread do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents a specific invoke asynchronous operation, returned when calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que representa um determinado invocar uma operação assíncrona, retornada ao chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> generated by the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>gerados pela operação assíncrona.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult parameter value is .
trans-unit.target: The asyncResult parameter value is .

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult object was not created by a preceding call of the method from the same control.
trans-unit.target: O asyncResult objeto não foi criado por uma chamada anterior do método do mesmo controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é inserido.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the form that the control is on.
trans-unit.target: Recupera a forma que o controle está em.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property value might not be the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> returned by FindForm method.
trans-unit.target: O controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>valor da propriedade não pode ser o mesmo que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>retornado pelo método FindForm.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> is on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controle está dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>controle e o que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>está em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> controle controle</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that the control is on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> que o controle está em.

trans-unit.source: Sets input focus to the control.
trans-unit.target: Define o foco para o controle de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The Focus method returns `true` if the control successfully received input focus.
trans-unit.target: O método de foco retorna `true` se o controle recebida com êxito o foco de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The control can have the input focus while not displaying any visual cues of having the focus.
trans-unit.target: O controle pode ter o foco de entrada ao não exibir qualquer indicações visuais de ter o foco.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is primarily observed by the nonselectable controls listed below, or any controls derived from them.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento é observado principalmente pelos controles nonselectable listados abaixo, ou todos os controles derivam-los.

trans-unit.source: A control can be selected and receive input focus if all the following are true: the `Selectable` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode ser selecionado e receber o foco de entrada se todos os itens a seguir forem verdadeiras: o `Selectable` valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>é definido como `true`, está contida em outro controle e todos os seus controles pai são visíveis e habilitados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Os controles de formulários do Windows na lista a seguir não são selecionáveis.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from these controls are also not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Controles derivados desses controles também não são selecionáveis.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control) > [!NOTE] > Focus is a low-level method intended primarily for custom control authors.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(quando não houver nenhum presente no controle de link) > [!NOTE] > foco é um método de baixo nível destinado principalmente para autores de controle personalizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Instead, application programmers should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property for child controls, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> method for forms.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, os programadores de aplicativos devem usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>método ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>propriedade para controles filho, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A>método para formulários.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input focus request was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a solicitação de foco de entrada foi bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle tem foco de entrada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle tem foco. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte do texto exibido pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: The Font property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de fonte é uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de ambiente é uma propriedade de controle que, se não for definido, será recuperado do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>terão o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>como seu pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>por padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre propriedades de ambiente, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>classe ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the Font property a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Drawing.Font>é imutável (o que significa que você não pode ajustar qualquer uma de suas propriedades), você só pode atribuir a propriedade Font novo <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode basear a nova fonte da fonte existente.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```c# myControl.Font = new Font(myControl.Font, myControl.Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb# MyControl.Font = New Font(MyControl.Font, _ MyControl.Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] Este é um exemplo de como ajustar a fonte existente para torná-lo em negrito:```c# myControl.Font = new Font(myControl.Font, myControl.Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb# MyControl.Font = New Font(MyControl.Font, _ MyControl.Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ```

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto exibido pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação de programação ou por meio da interação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the font of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura da fonte do controle.

trans-unit.source: The height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A altura do <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> do controle em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano do controle.

trans-unit.source: The ForeColor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ForeColor é uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de ambiente é uma propriedade de controle que, se não for definido, será recuperado do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>terão o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>como seu pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>por padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre propriedades de ambiente, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>classe ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro plano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação de programação ou por meio da interação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the control that contains the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o controle que contém o identificador especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method searches up the window handle parent chain until it finds a handle that is associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: Este método pesquisa a cadeia de pai do identificador de janela até encontrar um identificador que é associado um controle.

trans-unit.source: This method is more reliable than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromHandle%2A> method, because it correctly returns controls that own more than one handle.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é mais confiável do que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromHandle%2A>método, porque retorna corretamente os controles que possuem mais de um identificador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The window handle (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) to search for.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de janela (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) para pesquisar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the control associated with the specified handle; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no control with the specified handle is found.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que representa o controle associado com o identificador especificado; retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nenhum controle com o identificador especificado for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the control that is currently associated with the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o controle que está associado com o identificador especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromChildHandle%2A> method if you need to return controls that own more than one handle.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromChildHandle%2A>método se precisar retornar controles que possuem mais de um identificador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromChildHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The window handle (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) to search for.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de janela (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) para pesquisar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the control associated with the specified handle; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no control with the specified handle is found.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que representa o controle associado com o identificador especificado; retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nenhum controle com o identificador especificado for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> that identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""> </xref> que identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para recuperar.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating how a control will behave when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um valor que indica como um controle se comportará quando seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>propriedade está habilitada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the child control that is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o controle filho que está localizado em coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: If there is no child control at the specified point, the GetChildAtPoint method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um controle filho não existe no ponto especificado, o método GetChildAtPoint retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates where you want to look for a control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que contém as coordenadas em que você deseja pesquisar um controle.

trans-unit.source: Coordinates are expressed relative to the upper-left corner of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas são expressas em relação ao canto superior esquerdo da área do cliente do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the control that is located at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que representa o controle que está localizado no ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the child control that is located at the specified coordinates, specifying whether to ignore child controls of a certain type.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o controle filho que está localizado em coordenadas especificadas, especificar se deseja ignorar controles filho de um determinado tipo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates where you want to look for a control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que contém as coordenadas em que você deseja pesquisar um controle.

trans-unit.source: Coordinates are expressed relative to the upper-left corner of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas são expressas em relação ao canto superior esquerdo da área do cliente do controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GetChildAtPointSkip"></xref>, determining whether to ignore child controls of a certain type.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GetChildAtPointSkip"> </xref>, determinar se irá ignorar os controles filho de um determinado tipo.

trans-unit.source: The child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O filho <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> em coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Returns the next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl"></xref> up the control's chain of parent controls.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o próximo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl"> </xref> backup cadeia do controle de controles pai.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl"></xref>, that represents the parent of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl"> </xref>, que representa o pai do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the next control forward or back in the tab order of child controls.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o próximo controle para frente ou para trás na ordem de tabulação de controles filho.

trans-unit.source: The GetNextControl method is dependent on tab order.
trans-unit.target: O método GetNextControl é dependente de ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: To iterate through all controls of a form, including nested controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para iterar por todos os controles de um formulário, incluindo controles aninhados, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get or set the active control of a container control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir o controle ativo de um controle de contêiner, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to start the search with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> para iniciar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to search backward.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Pesquisar para frente na ordem de tabulação; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para pesquisar para trás.

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: O próximo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual um controle pode ser ajustado.

trans-unit.source: The behavior of GetPreferredSize differs by control.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de GetPreferredSize difere pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A> might be unable to assign the returned size to the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A>pode ser não é possível atribuir o tamanho retornado para o controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases.
trans-unit.target: Você pode retornar um tamanho maior do que as restrições indicadas no `proposedSize` parâmetro, mas `proposedSize` diminua como diminui a restrição.

trans-unit.source: For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` não deve ser maior do que `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`.

trans-unit.source: The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.
trans-unit.target: A exceção é um `proposedSize` 0 ou `Size.Empty`, que é definido como irrestrita.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área tamanho personalizado para um controle.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado de tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: Recupera os limites dentro do qual o controle é dimensionado.

trans-unit.source: This is a helper method that is called by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> to retrieve the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: Este é um método auxiliar que é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>para recuperar os limites dentro do qual o controle é dimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to reuse the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> scaling logic, but you must supply your own bounds.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir este método para reutilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>dimensionamento lógica, mas você deve fornecer a seus próprios limites.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns scaled bounds that take into account the `specified` bounds, whether the control is top level, whether the control is fixed width or auto size, and any adornments the control might have.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão retorna limites de escala que levam em conta a `specified` limites, se o controle é o nível superior, se o controle é fixo largura ou dimensionamento automático e qualquer ornamentos pode ter o controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que especifica a área para o qual recuperar os limites de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: A altura e a largura dos limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> que especifica os limites do controle a ser usado ao definir seu tamanho e posição.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites dentro do qual o controle é dimensionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified control style bit for the control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o valor de bit de estilo do controle especificado para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Control style bit flags are used to categorize supported behavior.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores de bit de estilo de controle são usados para categorizar comportamento com suporte.

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method and passing in the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit and the Boolean value to set the bit to.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode habilitar um estilo chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>método e passando apropriada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bit e o valor booliano para definir o bit para.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value assigned to a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit, use the GetStyle method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> member to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o valor atribuído a um especificado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bits, use o método GetStyle e passe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>membro para avaliar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> bit to return the value from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"> </xref> bit para retornar o valor de.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified control style bit is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o bit de estilo do controle especificado é definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the control is a top-level control.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o controle é um controle de nível superior.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is a top-level control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle for um controle de nível superior; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The GiveFeedback event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: O evento GiveFeedback é gerado quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar é iniciada.

trans-unit.source: With the GiveFeedback event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Com o evento GiveFeedback, a origem de um evento arrastar pode modificar a aparência do ponteiro do mouse para fornecer os comentários visuais do usuário durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>método determina o controle no local atual do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele verifica para ver se o controle é um destino válido.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the GiveFeedback event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle é um destino válido, o evento GiveFeedback é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor do mouse, o estado de teclado e o estado do botão do mouse são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai de uma janela, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra em outro controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>para que o controle é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade de evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the GiveFeedback event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Continue`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>é gerado para continuar a operação e o evento GiveFeedback é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and GiveFeedback events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>e GiveFeedback eventos são combinados para dar conforme o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem possa executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Cancel`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle recebe o foco.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the window handle that the control is bound to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador de janela que o controle está vinculado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Handle property is a Windows `HWND`.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade Handle é um Windows `HWND`.

trans-unit.source: If the handle has not yet been created, referencing this property will force the handle to be created.
trans-unit.target: Se o identificador ainda não foram criado, fazendo referência a esta propriedade forçará o identificador a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that contains the window handle (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IntPtr>que contém o identificador de janela (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) do controle.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a handle is created for the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um identificador é criado para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A handle is created when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is displayed for the first time.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador é criado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>é exibida pela primeira vez.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is created that has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> set to `false`, the HandleCreated event will not be raised until <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> is set to `true`.
