trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controle deve reposicionar seus controles filhos.

trans-unit.source: The Layout event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: O evento de Layout ocorre quando controles filhos são adicionados ou removidos, quando os limites do controle será alterado e, quando ocorrerem outras alterações que podem afetar o layout do controle.

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O evento de layout pode ser suprimido usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: Suspensão de layout permite executar várias ações em um controle sem a necessidade de executar um layout para cada alteração.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a Layout event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você redimensiona e move um controle, cada operação deve gerar um evento de Layout.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância armazenada em cache do mecanismo de layout do controle.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEngine property gets the layout engine for the control's children rather than for the control itself.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade LayoutEngine obtém o mecanismo de layout para os filhos do controle em vez de controle em si.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref> para o conteúdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o foco de entrada deixa o controle.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in pixels, between the left edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância em pixels entre a borda esquerda do controle e a borda esquerda da área cliente do seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The Left property value is equivalent to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade esquerdo é equivalente ao <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> and Left property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> property value of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: As alterações feitas a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>e valores de propriedade esquerda causa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>valor da propriedade do controle para alterar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the left edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que representa a distância em pixels entre a borda esquerda do controle e a borda esquerda da área cliente do seu contêiner.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as coordenadas do canto superior esquerdo do controle em relação ao canto superior esquerdo de seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Point> class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the upper-left point of the control.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Drawing.Point>classe é um tipo de valor (`Structure` na [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` em [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), ele é retornado por valor, o que significa que acessar a propriedade retorna uma cópia do ponto superior esquerdo do controle.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: So, adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point> returned from this property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property values of the control.
trans-unit.target: Assim, ajustando a <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Drawing.Point>retornada desta propriedade não afetará o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>valores de propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust these properties set each property value individually, or set the Location property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar essas propriedades, defina cada valor de propriedade individualmente ou defina a propriedade de local com um novo <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the Location property value represents the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, o valor da propriedade local representa o canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>em coordenadas de tela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa o canto superior esquerdo do controle em relação ao canto superior esquerdo de seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location*>o valor da propriedade foi alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação de programação ou por meio da interação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle perde o foco.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaçamento entre controles.

trans-unit.source: Controls receive default values for Margin that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Controles de recebem valores padrão para a margem estão razoavelmente próximos diretrizes de interface de usuário do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications.
trans-unit.target: Alguns ajustes ainda podem ser necessários para aplicativos específicos.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the Margin property on a docked control has no effect on the distance of the control from the the edges of its container.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definindo a propriedade Margin em um controle encaixado não tem nenhum efeito na distância do controle das bordas de seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaçamento entre controles.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's margin changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a margem do controle é alterado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the upper limit that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> can specify.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho que é o limite superior que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>pode especificar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado de tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the lower limit that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> can specify.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho que é o menor limite que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>pode especificar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado de tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which of the modifier keys (SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT) is in a pressed state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica qual das teclas modificadoras (SHIFT, CTRL e ALT) está em um estado pressionado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which of the mouse buttons is in a pressed state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica qual dos botões do mouse em um estado pressionado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle perde a captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: In rare scenarios, you might need to detect unexpected input.
trans-unit.target: Em situações raras, pode ser necessário detectar inesperado de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For example, consider the following scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, considere os cenários a seguir.

trans-unit.source: - During a mouse operation, the user opens the Start menu by pressing the Windows key or CTRL+ESC.
trans-unit.target: -Durante uma operação de mouse, o usuário abre o menu Iniciar, pressionando a tecla do Windows ou CTRL + ESC.

trans-unit.source: - During a mouse operation, the user switches to another program by pressing ALT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: -Durante uma operação de mouse, o usuário alterna para outro programa pressionando ALT + TAB.

trans-unit.source: - During a mouse operation, another program displays a window or a message box that takes focus away from the current application.
trans-unit.target: -Durante uma operação de mouse, o outro programa exibe uma janela ou uma caixa de mensagem que recebe o foco para fora do aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: Mouse operations can include clicking and holding the mouse on a form or a control, or performing a mouse drag operation.
trans-unit.target: As operações de mouse podem incluir clicando e mantendo o mouse em um formulário ou controle ou executando um mouse a operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: If you have to detect when a form or a control loses mouse capture for these and related unexpected scenarios, you can use the MouseCaptureChanged event.
trans-unit.target: Se você detectar quando um formulário ou um controle perde a captura do mouse para esses cenários inesperados relacionados e você pode usar o evento MouseCaptureChanged.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é clicado com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: Depressing a mouse button when the cursor is over a control typically raises the following series of events from the control: 1.
trans-unit.target: Pressionar um botão do mouse quando o cursor está sobre um controle normalmente gera a seguinte série de eventos do controle: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: MouseClick event.
trans-unit.target: Evento MouseClick.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class.
trans-unit.target: Para que isso ocorra, vários eventos não podem ser desabilitados na classe do controle.

trans-unit.source: Two single clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second MouseClick event.
trans-unit.target: Dois cliques ocorridos fechar suficiente no momento, conforme determinado pelas configurações de mouse do sistema operacional do usuário irá gerar um único um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>eventos em vez do segundo evento MouseClick.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>eventos são eventos logicamente, o nível mais alto de um controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, eles são gerados por outras ações, como pressionar a tecla ENTER quando o controle tem foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é duplo clique do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The MouseDoubleClick event occurs when the user depresses a mouse button twice in quick succession when the cursor is over the control.
trans-unit.target: O evento MouseDoubleClick ocorre quando o usuário pressiona um botão do mouse duas vezes em sucessão rápida quando o cursor está sobre o controle.

trans-unit.source: The time interval that separates two single clicks from a double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de tempo que separa os dois cliques únicas de um clique duplo é determinado pelas configurações de mouse do sistema operacional do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The following series of events is raised by the control when such a user action takes place: 1.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte série de eventos é gerada pelo controle quando tal uma ação do usuário: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: MouseDoubleClick event.
trans-unit.target: Evento MouseDoubleClick.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class.
trans-unit.target: Para que isso ocorra, vários eventos não podem ser desabilitados na classe do controle.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>eventos são eventos logicamente, o nível mais alto de um controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: They may be raised by other user actions, such as shortcut key combinations.
trans-unit.target: Eles podem ser gerados por outras ações do usuário, como combinações de teclas de atalho.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse está sobre o controle e um botão do mouse é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de mouse ocorrem na seguinte ordem: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> / MouseDown / <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>/ MouseDown / <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>4.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> 5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>5.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> > [!NOTE] > The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>, MouseDown, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>> [!NOTE] > Os eventos a seguir não são gerados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>classe a menos que haja pelo menos um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>MouseDown, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Se houver pelo menos um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>na coleção, e o usuário interage com o cabeçalho de controle da guia (onde o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>nomes aparecerão), o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>gera o evento apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se a interação do usuário estiver na área do cliente da página da guia, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>gera o evento apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse entra o controle.

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de mouse ocorrem na seguinte ordem: 1.

trans-unit.source: MouseEnter 2.
trans-unit.target: MouseEnter 2.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> 3.

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Se houver pelo menos um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>na coleção, e o usuário interage com o cabeçalho de controle da guia (onde o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>nomes aparecerão), o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>gera o evento apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se a interação do usuário estiver na área do cliente da página da guia, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>gera o evento apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse permanece sobre o controle.

trans-unit.source: A typical use of MouseHover is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: Um uso típico de MouseHover é para exibir uma dica de ferramenta quando o mouse faz uma pausa em um controle dentro de uma área especificada ao redor do controle ("retângulo de foco").

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A pausa necessária para este evento a ser gerado é especificada em milissegundos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MouseHover event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O evento MouseHover é definido e detectado na conexão com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the mouse cursor in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição do cursor do mouse em coordenadas da tela.

trans-unit.source: The MousePosition property returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> that represents the mouse cursor position at the time the property was referenced.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade retorna MousePosition um <xref:System.Drawing.Point>que representa a posição do cursor do mouse no momento em que a propriedade foi referenciada.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The coordinates indicate the position on the screen, not relative to the control, and are returned regardless of whether the cursor is positioned over the control.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas indicam a posição na tela, não em relação ao controle e são retornadas, independentemente se o cursor estiver posicionado sobre o controle.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the screen are 0,0.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas do canto superior esquerdo da tela são 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The MousePosition property is identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MousePosition é idêntica de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que contém as coordenadas do cursor do mouse em relação ao canto superior esquerdo da tela.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse está sobre o controle e um botão do mouse é liberado.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do controle.

trans-unit.source: The Name property can be used at run time to evaluate the object by name rather than type and programmatic name.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome pode ser usada em tempo de execução para avaliar o objeto pelo nome em vez de tipo e nome programático.

trans-unit.source: Because the Name property returns a <xref:System.String> type, it can be evaluated in case-style logic statements (`Select` statement in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `switch` statement in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/add/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: Porque a propriedade Name retorna um <xref:System.String>tipo, ele pode ser avaliado em instruções de lógica de estilo de caso (`Select` instrução em [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `switch` instrução em [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/add/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]).</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The name of the control.
trans-unit.target: O nome do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated"></xref> event with a specified region of the control to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated"> </xref> eventos com uma região especificada do controle para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área para invalidar.

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSizeChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.target: O método OnAutoSizeChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the control of Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o controle de mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The OnNotifyMessage method is called if the control's `EnableNotifyMessage` style bit is set in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>.
trans-unit.target: O método OnNotifyMessage é chamado se o controle `EnableNotifyMessage` bit de estilo é definido em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The `EnableNotifyMessage` style in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enables the control to be notified when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method receives a Windows message.
trans-unit.target: O `EnableNotifyMessage` de estilo em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>permite que o controle a ser notificado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>método recebe uma mensagem do Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: With this method, semi-trusted controls can listen for Windows messages without enabling them to modify the message.
trans-unit.target: Com esse método, controles de confiança parcial podem escutar mensagens do Windows sem ativá-las modificar a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that represents the Windows message.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> que representa a mensagem do Windows.

trans-unit.source: After dragging has begun, this method is called repeatedly by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] until the drag operation is either canceled or completed.
trans-unit.target: Depois de iniciada arrastando, este método é chamado repetidamente pelo [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] até que a operação de arrastar seja cancelada ou concluída.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Override this method if you want to change the point at which dragging is canceled or at which a drop occurs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Substituir este método se você quiser alterar o ponto no qual arrastar foi cancelada ou em que ocorre uma queda.
