trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o preenchimento dentro do controle.

trans-unit.source: For containers such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the Padding property gets or sets their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para contêineres, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, a propriedade Padding obtém ou define suas respectivas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is equal to its Padding property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é igual à sua propriedade de preenchimento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Controls receive default values for Padding that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Controles de recebimento padrão, os valores de preenchimento que são razoavelmente próximos diretrizes de interface de usuário do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications.
trans-unit.target: Alguns ajustes ainda podem ser necessários para aplicativos específicos.

trans-unit.source: All controls that implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> are enlarged by the amount in Padding when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Todos os controles que implementam <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>são ampliadas pela quantidade de preenchimento quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following controls do not use Padding: - Controls that do not implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> - Custom controls that directly inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes controles não usar o preenchimento:-controles que não implementam <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>-controles personalizados que herdam diretamente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser></xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> representar características de espaçamento interno do controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's padding changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle do preenchimento de alterações.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: The Paint event is raised when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: O evento de pintura é gerado quando o controle é redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: It passes an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> to the method(s) that handles the Paint event.
trans-unit.target: Ele passa uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>para o método que manipula o evento de pintura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When creating a new custom control or an inherited control with a different visual appearance, you must provide code to render the control by overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao criar um novo controle personalizado ou um controle herdado com uma aparência diferente, você deve fornecer o código para processar o controle, substituindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overriding the OnPaint Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Control Painting and Rendering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [substituindo o método OnPaint](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [personalizado controle pintura e renderização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parent container of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o contêiner pai do controle.

trans-unit.source: Setting the Parent property value to `null` removes the control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of its current parent control.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o valor da propriedade pai como `null` remove o controle a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>do controle pai atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the parent or container control of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que representa o controle pai ou o contêiner do controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou a interação do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Força o controle a aplicar lógica de layout para todos os seus controles filhos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the PerformLayout method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método foi chamado antes de chamar o método PerformLayout, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>evento será suprimido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created are set to `null` if no values were provided when the PerformLayout method was called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>criados são definidos para `null` se nenhum valor foi fornecido quando o método PerformLayout foi chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Força o controle a aplicar lógica de layout para todos os seus controles filhos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método foi chamado antes de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>método, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>evento será suprimido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `affectedControl` and `affectedProperty` parameters can both be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: O `affectedControl` e `affectedProperty` parâmetros podem ser definidos como `null`.

trans-unit.source: Doing so causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created to be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Fazer assim faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>criado para ser definido como `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the most recently changed control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que representa a última alterado controle.

trans-unit.source: The name of the most recently changed property on the control.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade alterada mais recentemente no controle.

trans-unit.source: Computes the location of the specified screen point into client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o local do ponto de tela especificada nas coordenadas do cliente.

trans-unit.source: The screen coordinate <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada da tela <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> para converter.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , p, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um que representa o objeto , p , nas coordenadas do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Computes the location of the specified client point into screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o local do ponto de cliente especificado em coordenadas da tela.

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada de cliente <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> para converter.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , p, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um que representa o objeto , p , em coordenadas de tela.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual o controle pode conter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> containing the height and width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém a altura e largura em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Preprocesses keyboard or input messages within the message loop before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processa teclado ou mensagens de entrada dentro do loop de mensagem antes de serem distribuídos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that represents the message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> que representa a mensagem para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PreProcessControlState"></xref> values, depending on whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*> are <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PreProcessControlState"></xref> values, depending on whether <>*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and whether <>*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*> are <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*>

trans-unit.source: Preprocesses keyboard or input messages within the message loop before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processa teclado ou mensagens de entrada dentro do loop de mensagem antes de serem distribuídos.

trans-unit.source: PreProcessMessage is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: PreProcessMessage é chamado pelo loop de mensagens do aplicativo para mensagens de entrada de pré-processamento antes de serem distribuídos.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis para a `msg` parâmetro são WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR e WM_SYSCHAR.

trans-unit.source: When overriding PreProcessMessage, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir PreProcessMessage, um controle deve retornar `true` para indicar que ele processou a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned.
trans-unit.target: Para mensagens que não são processadas pelo controle, o resultado de `base.PreProcessMessage` devem ser retornados.

trans-unit.source: Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> instead of overriding PreProcessMessage.
trans-unit.target: Controles normalmente substituirá um dos métodos mais especializados, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>em vez de substituir PreProcessMessage.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem para processar.

trans-unit.source: The possible values are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis são WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR e WM_SYSCHAR.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> eventos quando uma tecla é pressionada enquanto o foco está neste controle.

trans-unit.source: Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses.
trans-unit.target: Alguns pressionamentos de teclas, como guia, RETURN, ESC e teclas de direção, normalmente são ignorados por alguns controles porque eles não são considerados entrados pressionamentos de teclas.

trans-unit.source: For example, by default, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control ignores the arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, por padrão, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>controle ignora as teclas de direção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: Pressionar as teclas de direção normalmente faz com que o foco seja movido para o próximo ou anterior.

trans-unit.source: The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event for a<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: As teclas de direção são consideradas teclas de navegação e pressionando essas chaves normalmente dispara o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>evento para<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: However, pressing the arrow keys for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> does raise the PreviewKeyDown event.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a seta chaves para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>Gerar o evento PreviewKeyDown.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: By handling the PreviewKeyDown event for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> property to `true`, you can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event when the arrow keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Ao manipular o evento PreviewKeyDown para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>e configuração o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>propriedade `true`, você pode gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>evento quando pressionadas as teclas de direção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se você lidar com as teclas de direção, o foco não será movido para o controle anterior ou próximo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para manipular as teclas de comando.

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: As chaves de comando são chaves que sempre têm precedência sobre as chaves de entrada regulares.

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: Aceleradores e atalhos do menu são exemplos de teclas de comando.

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: O método deve retornar `true` para indicar que ele processou a chave de comando, ou `false` para indicar que a chave não é uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado apenas quando o controle é hospedado em um aplicativo Windows Forms ou como um controle ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: The ProcessCmdKey method first determines whether the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, and if so, enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> to process the command key.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessCmdKey primeiro determina se o controle tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>e nesse caso, permite que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>para processar a chave de comando.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's ProcessCmdKey method.
trans-unit.target: Se a chave de comando não é um atalho do menu e o controle tem um pai, a chave é passada para o método de ProcessCmdKey do pai.

trans-unit.source: The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O efeito líquido é comando chaves "transferidas" até a hierarquia de controle.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key.
trans-unit.target: Além da chave que o usuário pressionou, os dados de chave também indicam que, se houver, teclas modificadoras foram pressionadas no mesmo momento que a chave.

trans-unit.source: Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Teclas modificadoras incluem as teclas SHIFT, CTRL e ALT.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caractere foi processado pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caractere de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as control mnemonics.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado durante o pré-processamento para lidar com caracteres de caixa de diálogo, como mnemônicos de controle de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the character.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado somente se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>método indica que o controle não está processando o caractere.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogChar method simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessDialogChar method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessDialogChar simplesmente envia o caractere para o método de ProcessDialogChar do pai ou retorna `false` se o controle não tem nenhum pai.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog characters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe substitui esse método para executar o processamento real de caracteres da caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado apenas quando o controle é hospedado em um aplicativo Windows Forms ou como um controle ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caractere foi processado pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para lidar com caracteres de caixa de diálogo, como chaves de tabulação, ESC, seta e retorno.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado somente se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>método indica que o controle não está processando a chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessDialogKey method, or returns `false`if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O ProcessDialogKey simplesmente envia o caractere para o método de ProcessDialogKey do pai ou retorna `false`se o controle não tem nenhum pai.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe substitui esse método para executar o processamento real das caixas de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado apenas quando o controle é hospedado em um aplicativo Windows Forms ou como um controle ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a key message and generates the appropriate control events.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma mensagem de tecla e gera os eventos de controle apropriado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado quando um controle recebe uma mensagem do teclado.

trans-unit.source: The method is responsible for generating the appropriate key events for the message by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O método é responsável por gerar os eventos de chave apropriados para a mensagem chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: O `m` parâmetro contém a mensagem de janela que deve ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, WM_SYSKEYUP, and WM_IME_CHAR.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>são de propriedade WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, WM_SYSKEYUP e WM_IME_CHAR.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma mensagem do teclado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado quando um controle recebe uma mensagem do teclado.

trans-unit.source: The method first determines whether the control has a parent; if so, it calls the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método primeiro determina se o controle tem um pai; Se assim, ele chama o pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method does not process the message then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A> method is called to generate the appropriate keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: Se o pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>método não processa a mensagem a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A>método é chamado para gerar os eventos de teclado apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: O `m` parâmetro contém a mensagem de janela que deve ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>são de propriedade WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP e WM_SYSKEYUP.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Visualiza uma mensagem do teclado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado por um controle filho quando o controle filho recebe uma mensagem do teclado.

trans-unit.source: The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message.
trans-unit.target: O controle filho chama esse método antes de gerar os eventos de teclado para a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message processed and does not generate any keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: Se esse método retornar `true`, o controle filho considera a mensagem processada e não gera os eventos de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message to preview.
trans-unit.target: O `m` parâmetro contém a mensagem da janela de visualização.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>são de propriedade WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP e WM_SYSKEYUP.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessKeyPreview method simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessKeyPreview method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessKeyPreview simplesmente envia o caractere para o método de ProcessKeyPreview do pai ou retorna `false` se o controle não tem nenhum pai.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe substitui esse método para executar o processamento real das caixas de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caractere mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado para fornecer um controle a oportunidade de processar um caractere mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: O método deve determinar se o controle está em estado de mnemônicos de processo e se se o caractere especificado representa um mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se assim, o método deve executar a ação associada ao mnemônico e retorno `true`.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se não, o método deve retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: As implementações desse método geralmente usam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>método para determinar se o caractere especificado corresponde a um mnemônico no texto do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` This default implementation of the ProcessMnemonic method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` essa implementação padrão do método ProcessMnemonic simplesmente retorna `false` para indicar que o controle não tem nenhum mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caractere tiver sido processado como um mnemônico pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the product name of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do produto do assembly que contém o controle.

trans-unit.source: The ProductName property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ProductName é uma propriedade somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of this property, set the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o valor dessa propriedade, defina o <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute>.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute> </xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the ProductName property.
trans-unit.target: A linha de código c# a seguir define a propriedade ProductName.

trans-unit.source: ``` [assembly: AssemblyProduct("MyApplication")] ``` > [!NOTE] > It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version.
trans-unit.target: ``` [assembly: AssemblyProduct("MyApplication")] ``` > [!NOTE]> É altamente recomendável que você forneça o nome da empresa, o nome do produto e a versão do produto.

trans-unit.source: Providing this information enables the use of Windows Forms features such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that make it easier to write applications that comply with the "Certified for Windows" program.
trans-unit.target: Fornecer essas informações permite o uso de recursos do Windows Forms como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>que facilitam a gravar aplicativos que estão em conformidade com o programa de "Certificado para Windows".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Certified for Windows program, see http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o programa de certificados para o Windows, consulte http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.

trans-unit.source: The product name of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: O nome do produto do assembly que contém o controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a versão do assembly que contém o controle.

trans-unit.source: The ProductVersion property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ProductVersion é uma propriedade somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of this property, set the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute.Version%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o valor dessa propriedade, defina o <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute.Version%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute>.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute> </xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute.Version%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the ProductVersion property.
trans-unit.target: A linha de código c# a seguir define a propriedade ProductVersion.

trans-unit.source: ``` [assembly: AssemblyVersion("1.0.1")] ``` > [!NOTE] > It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version.
trans-unit.target: ``` [assembly: AssemblyVersion("1.0.1")] ``` > [!NOTE]> É altamente recomendável que você forneça o nome da empresa, o nome do produto e a versão do produto.

trans-unit.source: Providing this information enables the use of Windows Forms features such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that make it easier to write applications that comply with the "Certified for Windows" program.
trans-unit.target: Fornecer essas informações permite o uso de recursos do Windows Forms como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>que facilitam a gravar aplicativos que estão em conformidade com o programa de "Certificado para Windows".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Certified for Windows program, see http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o programa de certificados para o Windows, consulte http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.

trans-unit.source: The file version of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: A versão do arquivo do assembly que contém o controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents a propagating IME mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que representa um modo IME propagação.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a propagating IME mode.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa um modo IME propagação.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> is providing help to accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> fornece ajuda para os aplicativos de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>classe habilitar usuários a chamar a Ajuda em seu objeto acessível, pressionando a tecla F1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> provides you with complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>fornece a você informações completas em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar e permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar e soltar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento QueryContinueDrag é gerado quando há uma alteração no estado de botão do teclado ou mouse durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O evento QueryContinueDrag permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar e soltar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>método determina o controle no local atual do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele verifica para ver se o controle é um destino válido.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor do mouse, o estado de teclado e o estado do botão do mouse são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai de uma janela, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra em outro controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>para que o controle é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, theQueryContinueDrag event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no estado de botão do mouse ou teclado, theQueryContinueDrag evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, soltar os dados, ou para cancelar a operação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade de evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Continue`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>eventos são combinados para dar conforme o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem possa executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Cancel`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: By default, the QueryContinueDrag event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Cancel` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the ESC key was pressed and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Drop` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o evento QueryContinueDrag define <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>para `Cancel` em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>se a tecla ESC foi pressionada e define <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>para `Drop` em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>se o botão esquerdo, central ou direito do mouse é pressionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Forces the re-creation of the handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: Força a recriação do identificador para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The RecreateHandle method is called whenever parameters are needed for a new control, but using a call from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> is insufficient.
trans-unit.target: O método RecreateHandle é chamado sempre que parâmetros são necessários para um novo controle, mas o uso de uma chamada de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>é insuficiente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method also calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A> and<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este método também chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A>e<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> e define <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is currently re-creating its handle.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle está atualmente recriando seu identificador.

trans-unit.source: The RecreatingHandle property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method is still running on the control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade retorna RecreatingHandle `true` se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>método ainda está em execução no controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is currently re-creating its handle; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle está atualmente recriando seu identificador; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Computes the size and location of the specified screen rectangle in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o tamanho e o local do retângulo tela especificada nas coordenadas do cliente.

trans-unit.target: A coordenada da tela <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> para converter.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , r, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um que representa o objeto , r , nas coordenadas do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Computes the size and location of the specified client rectangle in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o tamanho e o local do retângulo cliente especificado em coordenadas da tela.

trans-unit.target: A coordenada de cliente <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> para converter.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , p, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um que representa o objeto , p , em coordenadas de tela.

trans-unit.source: Reflects the specified message to the control that is bound to the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Reflete a mensagem especificada para o controle que está associado ao identificador especificado.

trans-unit.source: The ReflectMessage method is an infrastructure method and typically should not be called from your code.
trans-unit.target: O método ReflectMessage é um método de infraestrutura e normalmente não deve ser chamado a partir do código.

trans-unit.source: If the `hWnd` parameter does not represent a valid control, the ReflectMessage method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o `hWnd` parâmetro não representa um controle válido, o método ReflectMessage retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: Because Windows messages are returned to the top-level window, the ReflectMessage method is used to propagate the return message to the control that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: Como mensagens do Windows são retornadas para a janela de nível superior, o método ReflectMessage é usado para propagar a mensagem de retorno para o controle que enviou a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> representing the handle of the control to reflect the message to.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IntPtr>que representa o identificador do controle para refletir a mensagem.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> representing the Windows message to reflect.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> que representa a mensagem do Windows para refletir.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was reflected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi refletida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Força o controle para invalidar sua área cliente e imediatamente redesenhado e os controles filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window region associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a região da janela associada ao controle.

trans-unit.source: The window region is a collection of pixels within the window where the operating system permits drawing.
trans-unit.target: A região da janela é uma coleção de pixels dentro da janela em que o sistema operacional permite desenho.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not display any portion of a window that lies outside of the window region.
trans-unit.target: O sistema operacional não exibir qualquer parte de uma janela que se encontra fora a região da janela.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of a control's region are relative to the upper-left corner of the control, not the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas da região do controle são relativas ao canto superior esquerdo do controle, não a área cliente do controle.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The collection of pixels contained with the region can be noncontiguous.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A coleção de pixels contido com a região pode ser não contígua.

trans-unit.source: The window <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: A janela <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> associado ao controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region*>
