trans-unit.source: You typically use this method if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Você normalmente usa esse método se você estiver criando ou um designer para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>ou criar seu próprio controle incorporar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> method to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controle redimensionado, você pode converter o `sender` parâmetro registrado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler>método para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>e obter sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>propriedade (ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>propriedades individualmente).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the Resize event.
trans-unit.target: Para lidar com layouts personalizados, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos em vez do evento de redimensionamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a Resize event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>é gerado em resposta a um evento de redimensionamento, mas também em resposta a outras alterações que afetam o layout do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control redraws itself when resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle é redesenhado quando redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: The ResizeRedraw property value is equivalent to the return value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method when passing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> value as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade ResizeRedraw é equivalente ao valor de retorno o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>método quando passando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>valor como um parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control redraws itself when resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle é redesenhado quando redimensionado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic.
trans-unit.target: Retoma a lógica de layout habitual.

trans-unit.source: Calling the ResumeLayout method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método ResumeLayout força um layout imediato se não houver nenhuma solicitação pendente de layout.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and ResumeLayout methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e ResumeLayout métodos são usados em conjunto para suprimir vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos enquanto você ajustar vários atributos do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the ResumeLayout method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você poderia chamar normalmente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método, em seguida, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>as propriedades do controle e, em seguida, chame o método ResumeLayout para habilitar as alterações entrem em vigor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for ResumeLayout to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Não deve haver nenhuma chamada pendente para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>para ResumeLayout a ser chamado com êxito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic, optionally forcing an immediate layout of pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Retoma a lógica de layout habitual, opcionalmente, forçando um layout imediato do layout solicitações pendentes.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método força um layout de imediato, se houver qualquer layout solicitações pendentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `performLayout` parâmetro está definido como `true`, um layout imediato ocorre se houver qualquer layout solicitações pendentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>métodos são usados em conjunto para suprimir vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos enquanto você ajustar vários atributos do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você poderia chamar normalmente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método, em seguida, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>as propriedades do controle e, em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método para permitir que as alterações entrem em vigor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Não deve haver nenhuma chamada pendente para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>a ser chamado com êxito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao adicionar vários controles a um controle pai, é recomendável que você chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>método antes de inicializar os controles sejam adicionados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Depois de adicionar os controles para o controle pai, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: Isso aumentará o desempenho de aplicativos com muitos controles.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to execute pending layout requests; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para executar solicitações de layout; pendentes Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a distância, em pixels, entre a borda direita do controle e a borda esquerda da área cliente do seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Right property is equal to the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> property value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade à direita é igual à soma do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>o valor da propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Right property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade à direita é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: You can change this property value indirectly by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar o valor da propriedade indiretamente, alterando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>Propriedades ou chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que representa a distância em pixels entre a borda direita do controle e a borda esquerda da área cliente do seu contêiner.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os elementos do controle são alinhados para dar suporte a localidades usando fontes da direita para esquerda.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RightToLeft é uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de ambiente é uma propriedade de controle que, se não for definido, será recuperado do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>terão o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>como seu pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>por padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre propriedades de ambiente, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>classe ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RightToLeft é usada para aplicativos internacionais, onde o idioma é escrito da direita para a esquerda, como hebraico ou árabe.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>, control elements that include text are displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>, elementos de controle que incluem texto são exibidos da direita para esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value of the RightToLeft property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o valor da propriedade RightToLeft é alterado em tempo de execução, somente bruto texto sem formatação é preservado.

trans-unit.source: The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the RightToLeft property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName> : - Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).
trans-unit.target: A seguir estão alguns exemplos de como os elementos de controle são afetados pelo valor da propriedade RightToLeft de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>:-barras de rolagem Vertical são exibidas no lado esquerdo, em vez de lado direito de controles roláveis (por exemplo, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, várias linhas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Barras de rolagem horizontal começar com a caixa de rolagem (thumb) alinhada à direita.

trans-unit.source: - The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: -O alinhamento do elemento de caixa de seleção, controlado pelo `CheckAlign` propriedade, é revertida para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: - Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Itens na caixa de listagem, caixa de combinação e controles para cima para baixo à direita são alinhados.

trans-unit.source: - Up and down buttons are left-aligned on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> controls.
trans-unit.target: -Para cima e para baixo botões são alinhados à esquerda em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>

trans-unit.source: - Menus (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) are displayed right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Menus (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) são exibidos alinhado à direita.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: - The alignment of toolbar buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control or the alignment of text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is not affected by the RightToLeft property.
trans-unit.target: -O alinhamento dos botões de barra de ferramentas em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>controle ou o alinhamento do texto em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>não é afetada pela propriedade RightToLeft.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>dá suporte ao alinhamento à direita para a esquerda; no entanto, o efeito em um controle ActiveX depende da extensão à qual o autor do controle implementou o suporte para a exibição da direita para esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou a interação do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Converte especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> ao apropriado <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> para oferecer suporte a texto da direita para esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and all child controls by the specified scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona o controle e todos os controles filho de acordo com o fator de escala especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Scale method scales the control by the specified scaling `factor`.
trans-unit.target: O método de escala dimensiona o controle de acordo com a escala especificada `factor`.

trans-unit.source: It also recursively scales all child controls if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ele também recursivamente dimensiona todos os controles filho se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> to scale each control.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, este método chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>Dimensionar cada controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> containing the horizontal and vertical scaling factors.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> que contém os fatores de escala horizontais e verticais.

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona o controle e os controles filho.

trans-unit.source: The ratio to use for scaling.
trans-unit.target: A razão para usar no dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Scales the entire control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona todo o controle e os controles filho.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O fator de escala horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O fator de escala vertical.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines the scaling of child controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que determina o dimensionamento de controles filho.

trans-unit.source: If the ScaleChildren property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A> method will recursively call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> method of each of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade ScaleChildren `true`, em seguida, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>método será chamada recursivamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>método de cada um dos seus controles filhos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of ScaleChildren always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a implementação padrão de ScaleChildren sempre `true`.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override ScaleChildren to return `false` to indicate that scaling should not be performed on their children.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem substituir ScaleChildren para retornar `false` para indicar que o dimensionamento não deve ser executado em seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if child controls will be scaled when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*> method on this control is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os controles filho será dimensionado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>método neste controle é chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona local, tamanho, preenchimento e margem de um controle.

trans-unit.source: If the control is top level, this will not scale the control's location.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle de nível superior, isso não será dimensionado local do controle.

trans-unit.source: This does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls.
trans-unit.target: Isso não se expandir filhos ou o tamanho dos controles dimensionados automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Você pode omitir o dimensionamento em qualquer direção, alterando o valor da `specified` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: O fator pelo qual a altura e largura do controle serão dimensionados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valor que especifica os limites do controle a ser usado ao definir seu tamanho e posição.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O fator de escala horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O fator de escala vertical.

trans-unit.source: Activates the control.
trans-unit.target: Ativa o controle.

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: O método de seleção ativa o controle se o controle `Selectable` bit de estilo é definido como `true` em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, está contida em outro controle e todos os seus controles pai são visíveis e habilitados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Os controles de formulários do Windows na lista a seguir não são selecionáveis.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: Controles derivados dos controles na lista também não poderão ser selecionados.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(quando não houver nenhum presente no controle de link)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: Ativa um controle filho.

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, especifica a direção na ordem de tabulação para selecionar o controle de.

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: O `directed` e `forward` parâmetros são usados por controles de estilo do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `directed` parâmetro está definido como `true`, o `forward` parâmetro é avaliado para determinar qual controle para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: Quando `forward` é definido como `true`, o próximo controle na ordem de tabulação é selecionado; quando `false`, o controle anterior na ordem de tabulação é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>método ativa o controle se o controle `Selectable` bit de estilo é definido como `true` em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, está contida em outro controle e todos os seus controles pai são visíveis e habilitados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Os controles de formulários do Windows na lista a seguir não são selecionáveis.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: Controles derivados dos controles na lista também não poderão ser selecionados.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(quando não houver nenhum presente no controle de link)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para especificar a direção do controle para selecionar; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para Avançar na ordem de tabulação; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para retroceder na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: Activates the next control.
trans-unit.target: Ativa o próximo controle.

trans-unit.source: The SelectNextControl method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: O método SelectNextControl ativa o próximo controle na ordem de tabulação, se o controle `Selectable` bit de estilo é definido como `true` em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, está contida em outro controle e todos os seus controles pai são visíveis e habilitados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Os controles de formulários do Windows na lista a seguir não são selecionáveis.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: Controles derivados dos controles na lista também não poderão ser selecionados.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control) When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or SelectNextControl methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(quando não houver nenhum presente no controle de link) quando você altera o foco usando o teclado (guia, SHIFT + TAB e assim por diante), chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>ou SelectNextControl métodos, ou definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para o formulário, os eventos focus ocorrem na seguinte ordem: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: Sends the control to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Envia o controle para trás da ordem z.

trans-unit.source: The control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: O controle é movido para trás da ordem z.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle é um filho de outro controle, o controle filho é movido para trás da ordem z.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle é um controle de nível superior, esse método não funcionará corretamente a menos que o controle está ativo.

trans-unit.source: A top-level control is a control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, that is not a child of another control.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de nível superior é um controle, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, que é não um filho de outro controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: An active control is a visible control that has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Um ativo é um controle visível que tem o foco de entrada.

trans-unit.source: To use the SendToBack method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A> method on the control.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o método SendToBack com um controle de nível superior, inativo, chame primeiro o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>método no controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating how a control will behave when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Define um valor que indica como um controle se comportará quando seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>propriedade está habilitada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.target: Define os limites do controle para o local especificado e o tamanho.

trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the control to the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Define os limites especificados do controle para o local especificado e o tamanho.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: For any parameter not specified, the current value will be used.
trans-unit.target: Para qualquer parâmetro não especificado, o valor atual será usado.

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: Executa o trabalho de configurar os limites especificados deste controle.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os parâmetros que correspondem dos limites não são incluídos no `specified` parâmetro são transmitidas com seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, or the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, ou <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>propriedade pode ser passada com uma referência para a instância atual do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Contudo, todos os valores passados são mantidos e aplicados ao controle.

trans-unit.source: The `boundsSpecified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: O `boundsSpecified` parâmetro representa os elementos dos controles <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>alterado pelo seu aplicativo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `Size` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controle, o `boundsSpecified` valor do parâmetro é o `Size` valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `None` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>é ajustada em resposta ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>propriedade sendo definida, o `boundsSpecified` valor do parâmetro é o `None` valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sistemas no Windows Server 2003, o tamanho de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>é restrito pelo máximo pixels de largura e altura do monitor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho da área cliente do controle.

trans-unit.source: The client area starts at the (0, 0) location and extends to the (`x`, `y`) location.
trans-unit.target: A área cliente começa com a (0, 0) local e se estende até o (`x`, `y`) local.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você não deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A>do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The client area width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A largura da área cliente, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The client area height, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A altura da área cliente, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Sets a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> flag to either <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define um especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"> </xref> sinalizador como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Control style bit flags are used to categorize supported behavior.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores de bit de estilo de controle são usados para categorizar comportamento com suporte.

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the SetStyle method and passing in the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit (or bits) and the Boolean value to set the bit(s) to.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode habilitar um estilo de chamar o método SetStyle e passando apropriada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bit (ou bits) e o valor booliano para definir o ão para.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value assigned to a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> member to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o valor atribuído a um especificado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bits, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>método e passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>membro para avaliar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Setting the control style bits can substantially change the behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Configurar o controle de bits de estilo substancialmente pode alterar o comportamento do controle.

trans-unit.source: Review the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enumeration documentation to understand the effects of changing the control style bits before calling the SetStyle method.
trans-unit.target: Examine o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>documentação de enumeração para entender os efeitos de alterar os bits de estilo de controle antes de chamar o método SetStyle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> bit to set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"> </xref> bit para definir.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the specified style to the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para aplicar o estilo especificado para o controle. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the control as the top-level control.
trans-unit.target: Define o controle como controle de nível superior.

trans-unit.source: If you call the SetTopLevel method of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and pass in a value of `false`, the form will not be visible until you call SetTopLevelagain, passing in a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se você chamar o método SetTopLevel de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>e passar um valor de `false`, o formulário não ficará visível até que você chame SetTopLevelagain, passando um valor de `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the control as the top-level control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para definir o controle como o controle de nível superior; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is set to and the control is an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: O value parâmetro está definido como e o controle é um controle ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: The return value is not equal to the value parameter and the property is not .
trans-unit.target: O <> *> valor de retorno não é igual de value parâmetro e o <> *> propriedade não é .

trans-unit.source: Sets the control to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: Define o controle para o estado de visibilidade especificado.

trans-unit.source: You would typically override this method to change the visibility behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você poderia substituir este método para alterar o comportamento de visibilidade do controle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the control visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para tornar o controle visível; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the control to the user.
trans-unit.target: Exibe o controle ao usuário.

trans-unit.source: Showing the control is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Mostrar o controle é equivalente à configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Show method is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property returns a value of `true` until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Depois que o método Show é chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>propriedade retorna um valor de `true` até que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control should display focus rectangles.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle deve exibir retângulos de foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this feature, see the[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx),[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx), and the [WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topics.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre esse recurso, consulte o[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx),[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx)e o [WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)tópicos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control should display focus rectangles; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle deve exibir retângulos de foco; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user interface is in the appropriate state to show or hide keyboard accelerators.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a interface do usuário está em um estado apropriado para mostrar ou ocultar os aceleradores de teclado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the keyboard accelerators are visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os aceleradores de teclado são visíveis; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the site of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o local do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>, se houver.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height and width of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura e largura do controle.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Drawing.Size>classe é um tipo de valor (`Structure` na [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` em [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), ele é retornado por valor, o que significa que acessar a propriedade retorna uma cópia do tamanho do controle.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: So, adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> returned from this property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Assim, ajustando a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Drawing.Size>retornada desta propriedade não afetará a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control, you must set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> property, or set the Size property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>do controle, você deve definir o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>propriedade, ou defina a propriedade de tamanho com um novo <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para manter o melhor desempenho, não defina o <xref:System.Drawing.Size>de um controle em seu construtor.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: É o método preferido substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sistemas no Windows Server 2003, o tamanho de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>é restrito pelo máximo pixels de largura e altura do monitor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the height and width of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a altura e largura do controle em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event to handle custom layouts.
trans-unit.target: É preferível usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos para lidar com layouts personalizados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> events, but also in other conditions when layout might need to be applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>é gerado em resposta a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>eventos, mas também em outras condições ao layout talvez precise ser aplicada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou a interação do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the entire control from the height and width of its client area.
trans-unit.target: Determina o tamanho de todo o controle de altura e largura da sua área cliente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value representing the height and width of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> valor que representa a altura e largura da área do cliente do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value representing the height and width of the entire control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> valor que representa a altura e largura de todo o controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control style changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o estilo de controle é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The StyleChanged event occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> flags have been added or changed.
trans-unit.target: O evento StyleChanged ocorre quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>sinalizadores foram adicionados ou alterados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o estilo do controle é alterado por uma modificação programática ou a interação do usuário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.
trans-unit.target: Suspende temporariamente a lógica de layout para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The layout logic of the control is suspended until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: A lógica de layout do controle será suspensa até que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SuspendLayout and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: O SuspendLayout e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>métodos são usados em conjunto para suprimir vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos enquanto você ajustar vários atributos do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the SuspendLayout method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você faria normalmente chamar o método SuspendLayout e definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>as propriedades do controle e, em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método para permitir que as alterações entrem em vigor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to SuspendLayout for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Não deve haver nenhuma chamada pendente para SuspendLayout para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>a ser chamado com êxito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the SuspendLayout method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao adicionar vários controles a um controle pai, é recomendável que você chamar o método SuspendLayout antes de inicializar os controles sejam adicionados.

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Depois de adicionar os controles para o controle pai, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: Isso aumentará o desempenho de aplicativos com muitos controles.

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando alterar as cores do sistema.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>é alterada por uma modificação programática ou a interação do usuário.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
